text: ve mithya baaten sunane vaale, avaidh bhakshee hain. atah yadi ve aapake paas aayen, to aap unake beech nirnay kar den athava unase munh pher len (aapako adhikaar hai). aur yadi aap unase munh pher len, to ve aapako koee haani nahin pahuncha sakenge aur yadi nirnay karen, to nyaay ke saath nirnay karen. nihsandeh allaah nyaayakaariyon se prem karata hai
